meanings.definition: Free from cloudiness, haziness, or obstructions
meanings.sent1: The sky was clearest in the morning, with no clouds in sight.
meanings.sent2: Her instructions were clearest when she used simple language.
meanings.sent3: The clearest water I've ever seen was in a glass bottle, not in the ocean.
meanings.sent4: His clearest thoughts were like a crystal-clear stream flowing through his mind.
meanings.sent5: The clearest memory I have is of the bright blue sky on a sunny day.

meanings.sent1: The clearest explanation came from the teacher who used examples.
meanings.sent2: His handwriting was clearest when he wrote slowly and neatly.
meanings.sent3: The clearest path to success is through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent4: Her intentions were as clearest as a neon sign in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The clearest sign of spring is when the flowers start to bloom.

meanings.sent1: The clearest feature of the painting was the vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: Among all the stars, the clearest one in the sky was Sirius.
meanings.sent3: The clearest sound in the forest was the chirping of a single bird.
meanings.sent4: His clearest memory of the trip was the taste of the exotic fruit.
meanings.sent5: The clearest image in his mind was of the majestic mountain peak.
